channel.title: Pi 317 dark bow special
channel.description: Can anyone help me out with this? I wanna get the dragon heads where only 1 hits at a time, there hitting at the same exact time as you see below... how can i fix this? please any help would be appreciated!!

item.title: Pi 317 dark bow special
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

sk8rdude461:

[quote author=Taharok link=topic=331370.msg2587177#msg2587177 date=0]3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Have you even attempted doing it?

I’d start by looking for the dark bow’s id in the combat code… specifically the part that checks for special attacks.[/quote]

Yes i have iv’e been looking for this for a long long time, i know more than likely it will be infront of my eyes lol i always look over the easiest things, i just don’t know what to change to get the spec the way i want it.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi 317 dark bow special
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Section Rules [READ OR GET PUNISHED] Last Updated: 7/23/11

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Have you even attempted doing it?

I’d start by looking for the dark bow’s id in the combat code… specifically the part that checks for special attacks.
